overview: Rose (Jala Fahmi) the beautiful girl with four thieves, they are Fares (Mohammed Hneidi), Najati (Alaa Wali al-Din), Qarni (Kamel Sharif) and Tarif (Ahmed Adam) stole a jewelry shop located in the center of the country. Each of them tries to win the money alone, hiding the jewelry, and after being arrested (Warda) try to access the jewelry.
title: A Fish and 4 Sharks
